aircraft.value: Sentinel-15 - AC-4445-863 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Wing spar corrosion detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 31/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 03/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 04/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 07/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
